CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Negotiations") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_In_Negotiations", "APTS_In_Negotiations", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Signatures") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Signatures", "APTS_Signatures", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "Terminated") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Terminated", "APTS_Terminated", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "Cancelled") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Cancelled", "APTS_Cancelled", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "Amended") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Amended", "APTS_Amended", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "Expired") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Expired", "APTS_Expired", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Effect") ,IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Effect", "APTS_Effect", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "Request"), IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Request", "APTS_Request", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Authoring"), IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Authoring", "APTS_Authoring", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Review"), IMAGE("/resource/In_Review", "In_Review", 50, 600) ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c , "In Filing"), IMAGE("/resource/In_Filling", "In_Filling", 50, 600) , IMAGE("/resource/APTS_Base", "APTS_Base", 50, 600) ) ) )))))))))
CustomField.label: Progress Bar
